# 使用方法

<jluzh-button>你好</jluzh-button>
<jluzh-button-group>
    <jluzh-button>上一页</jluzh-button>
    <jluzh-button>1</jluzh-button>
    <jluzh-button>2</jluzh-button>
    <jluzh-button>3</jluzh-button>
    <jluzh-button>...</jluzh-button>
    <jluzh-button>下一页</jluzh-button>
</jluzh-button-group>
